attributes.action: Ignore the petition to ban electric shock collars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Electric shock collars are a valubale training tool for responsible dog owners.

Not all dogs respond to treats or more positive methods control. 

When used responsibly as a TRAINING TOOL, electric collars are an excellent way of encouraging good behaviour.

To ban such devices will be an act of gross irresponsibility.
